original_text: They also honored us greatly, and when we were about to sail, they put on board whatever we needed.
korean_text: 후한 예로 우리를 대접하고 떠날 때에 우리 쓸 것을 배에 실었더라

sentences.original_text: and when we were about to sail
they put on board whatever we needed
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리에게 필요한 모든 것을 배에 실어 주었습니다
